releaseNotes:
Version 0.4.2 (2024-05-08) - Added validation checks to Edit/Add page

Version 0.4.0 (2024-05-05)
 - Changed some async calls to regular http calls
 - Added links on list view going to device page and edit page
 - Added editing/deleting of disabled entries
 - Fixed reported null pointer errors
